messages.title: AN IMPORTANT MESSAGE FROM THERESA MAY TO YOU
messages.content:
Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is vital.
Our future prosperity, our place in the world, and our standard of living all depend on getting the Brexit deal right.
And with your help, together we can make it work.
We will:
- Take back control of our borders, our laws and our money
- Sign new trade deals around the world with old friends and new partners
- Ensure we leave in a smooth and orderly way, and that Brexit works for you and the whole of the United Kingdom
- Provide as much clarity as possible at every stage of the process while maintaining a strong negotiating hand
Getting Brexit right matters because it will decide whether or not our children have a safe, secure and prosperous future.
Because only with a good deal from Brexit can we keep our growing economy and all the public services we rely on: well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS.
The only way you can ensure we have the strong and stable leadership to get this right is by backing me, and voting for my Conservative candidate in your local area.

messages.title: THE PROGRESS WE'VE MADE TOGETHER AS A NATION SINCE 2010
messages.content:
THE DEFICIT DOWN by almost two thirds
INCOME TAX CUT for 31 million people
2.8 MILLION NEW JOBS
WELFARE CAPPED to reward work
3 MILLION NEW APPRENTICESHIPS
SAFER STREETS with crime down by a third
DON'T RISK A COALITION OF CHAOS - VOTE THERESA MAY ON 8TH JUNE

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Take back control of borders, laws, and money; sign new trade deals; ensure a smooth and orderly leave process with a strong negotiating hand.
Keep a growing economy to fund public services including well-paid jobs, affordable housing, and a strong NHS.
Reduce the deficit by almost two-thirds since 2010.
Cut income tax for 31 million people.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is vital. Take back control of our borders, our laws and our money; sign new trade deals; ensure we leave in a smooth and orderly way, and that Brexit works for you and the whole of the United Kingdom.
issues.economy: Keep a growing economy and all the public services we rely on: well-paid jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS. The deficit down by almost two-thirds.
issues.education: A good school place for every child.
issues.health: A strong economy paying for a strong NHS.
issues.labourEmployment: 2.8 million new jobs. Create 3 million new apprenticeships.
issues.lawCrime: Reduce crime by a third. Safer streets with crime down by a third.

Getting on with the job of securing the best possible deal from Brexit is vital.
The risk is just too big to take: higher debt, higher taxes, economic chaos.
Think Jeremy Corbyn as Prime Minister is never going to happen? DON'T BE SO SURE.
